articles.title: Pfizer Vaccine Can Neutralise UK, South Africa Virus Variants: Study - NDTV
articles.description: The COVID-19 vaccine co-developed by the American pharmaceutical giant Pfizer and the German biotechnology company BioNTech can neutralise variants of the novel coronavirus that were first reported in the UK and South Africa, a new study suggests.

articles.title: Airtel to shutdown copper network; to offer only fiber broadband: Gopal Vittal - ETTelecom.com
articles.description: Bharti Airtel said that it will shutdown down its copper infrastructure in a year's time and will just offer Fiber-to-the Home in the country.
